text: Kevin Byers (born 23 August 1979) is a Scottish footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for Raith Rovers, Inverness Caledonian Thistle, Montrose, Forfar Athletic and Brechin City. He is currently the manager of Kennoway Star Hearts in the SJFA East Superleague. ==External links== * * ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:Scottish footballers Category:Raith Rovers F.C. players Category:Inverness Caledonian Thistle F.C. players Category:Montrose F.C. players Category:Forfar Athletic F.C. players Category:Brechin City F.C. players Category:Ballingry Rovers F.C. players Category:Kennoway Star Hearts J.F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Scottish Junior Football Association players Category:Scottish football managers Category:Footballers from Kirkcaldy
title: Kevin Byers
